Milt Kogan https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Milt_Kogan 0 Milt Kogan (born April 10, 1936) is an American actor. He is best known for playing the desk sergeant, Officer Kogan, on the television series Barney Miller in 1975. Milt_Kogan ( born April_10_,_1936 ) is an_American_actor . He is_best_known for playing the_desk_sergeant , Officer_Kogan , on the_television_series_Barney_Miller in 1975 .
